page.title: 09INDUSTRIAL SITES OF W. HULL
page.content: THIS AREA WAS, UNTIL RECENTLY, A RESIDENTIAL AREA, BUILT AROUND THE THREE MAIN ROADS INTO HULL. BECAUSE OF THE CONSIDERABLE DECLINE OF THE FISHING INDUSTRY IN RECENT YEARS, MANY AREAS OF HESSLE ROAD HAVE BEEN DEMOLISHED, AND REPLACED, IN PARTS, BY SMALL INDUSTRIAL SITES. THESE SITES WILL EVENTUALLY MAKE USE OF THE NEARLY CONSTRUCTED SOUTH ORBITAL ROAD WHICH RUNS PARALLEL TO THE HUMBER. THERE ARE THREE INDUSTRIAL SITES WITHIN THE DESIGNATED AREA: ST.ANDREWS PRIORY SIDINGS, HAWTHORNE AVENUE UNIT, DAIRYCOATES AND GIPSYVILLE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE. THE RANGE OF BUSINESSES IS CONSIDERABLE, COMPRISING OF MANUFACTURING UNITS, SERVICE INDUSTRIES, ADVERTISING, FOOD AND REPAIR SERVICES.
